tests.name: Routing.Forward
tests.setup: mkdir -p build && if [ ! -d "test_remote/" ]; then (git clone https://github.com/N2Sys-EDU/lab3-test.git test_remote && cd test_remote && mkdir -p build && cd build && cmake .. && make && cd ../.. && cp test_remote/build/lab3_test build/ && cp test_remote/libsimulator.a build/) fi && cd build && cmake .. && make
